name: Mariostro Strikers: Soccer League
summary:
Dive into the thrilling world of arcade-style soccer with [Your Game Name Here]! Experience the excitement of 4v4 matches, where every player counts. With 10 unique and fun teams to choose from, you’ll dribble, pass, and shoot your way to victory while defending your goal with a skilled goalkeeper.

Designed for fast-paced fun, this game focuses on easy-to-learn controls and engaging gameplay. Whether you’re sprinting down the field, setting up the perfect assist, or unleashing a powerful shot on goal, every moment is packed with action and excitement.
